sentence.Network_en: His impenitent attitude is really annoying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他死不改悔的态度真令人生气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 43. IMPENITENT不悔悟的(impenitent)<> remorseful感到后悔的 44. IMPERIOUS专横的(imperious) <>humble谦卑的  45. IMPUGN责难(impugn) <> extol颂扬  46.
2013年8月7日 - 之意,impenitent(不悔恨的)的词缀分析同上;至于后缀,例子就更多了,比如considerably里的“ably”就是副词的后缀;派生和合成的方法也比较简单,这里不再.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from ecclesiastical Latin impaenitent- 'not repenting', from Latin in- 'not' + paenitere 'repent'

auth_sentence.content: To forgive an impenitent man and to continue to punish a penitent are equally impossible.
auth_sentence.res_content: To forgive an impenitent man and to continue to punish a penitent are equally impossible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To forgive an impenitent man and to continue to punish a penitent are equally impossible.

auth_sentence.content: Bruno was declared an "impenitent, pertinacious, and obstinate heretic," and he was condemned to die.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bruno was declared an "impenitent, pertinacious, and obstinate heretic," and he was condemned to die.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bruno was declared an "impenitent, pertinacious, and obstinate heretic," and he was condemned to die.
